# cl-cart



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                      | Type                  | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `open`      | `open`        | Indicate whether the minicart is open or not.                                                                                    | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `openOnAdd` | `open-on-add` | Automatically open the minicart as soon as an item is added to the cart.                                                         | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `type`      | `type`        | By default the `cl-cart` is directly displayed in-place. Setting the `type` to `mini` will change the behavior to be a minicart. | `"mini" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
